      • countFrontTab

        public int[] countFrontTab(int p)
                    throws SyntaxException
        Count the number of prefix tabs at line where position p at
        Parameters:
        p - specified line
        Returns:
        3 information in array, [number of tabs, number of preifx tab '\t', number of prefix space ' ']
        Throws:
        SyntaxException - if p out of rang
